quotations.title: Quotations from New Doctor Who

quotation.p: "Have you come to take the ship back"?
"The ship? You still call it 'a ship'!"
quotation.source: Doctor #1 and #12, in "Twice Upon A Time"

quotation.p: I have the courage and the right to live and die as myself.
quotation.source: The First Doctor, in "Twice Upon A Time"

quotation.p: We have a choice. Either we change and go on... or we die as we are.
quotation.source: dThe Twelfth Doctor, in "Twice Upon A Time"

quotation.p: Does rather make me wish you understood English... or that I spoke German.
quotation.source: The Captain, in "Twice Upon A Time"

quotation.p: "It's bigger on the inside than it is on the outside!"
"You know, I thought it probably was. I'm glad it's not just me."
quotation.source: The Captain and the Twelfth Doctor, in "Twice Upon A Time"

quotation.p: Always remember where you parked. It's going to come up a lot.
quotation.source: The Twelfth Doctor, in "Twice Upon A Time"

quotation.p: "B-But I thought... Well, I, uh, assumed I'd get... younger."
"I *am* younger!"
quotation.source: The First and the Twelfth Doctor, in "Twice Upon A Time"

quotations.quotation:
"Wh-What was that?"
"To be fair, they cut out all the jokes." The First and the Twelfth Doctor, in "Twice Upon A Time"

quotation.p: "Quite beautiful really, isn't she?"
"Yeah, if you like ladies made of glass."
"Well, aren't all ladies made of glass, in a way?"
quotation.source: The Captain, Bill, and the First Doctor, in "Twice Upon A Time"

quotation.p: "I don't remember this. Why are you refusing the regeneration?"
"Fear. I am afraid. Very, very afraid."
quotation.source: The First and the Twelfth Doctor, in "Twice Upon A Time"

quotation.p: "There is good, and there is evil. I left Gallifrey to answer a question of my own. By any analysis, evil should always win. Good is not a practical survival strategy. It requires loyalty, self-sacrifice, and love. So, why does good prevail? What keeps the balance between good and evil in this appalling universe? Is there some kind of logic? Some mysterious force?"
"Perhaps there's just a bloke."
quotation.source: The First Doctor and Bill, in "Twice Upon A Time"

quotation.p: Oh. It's not an evil plan. I- I don't really know what to do when it isn't an evil plan.
quotation.source: The Twelfth Doctor, in "Twice Upon A Time"

quotation.p: I regret, Captain, that the universe generally fails to be a fairy tale.
quotation.source: The First Doctor, in "Twice Upon A Time"

quotation.p: I adjusted the time frame, only by a couple of hours. Any other day, it wouldn't make any difference. but this is Christmas 1914 and the human miracle is about to happen. The Christmas armistice... It never happened again. Any war, anywhere. But for one day, one Christmas, a very long time ago, everyone just put down their weapons and started to sing. Everybody just stopped. Everyone... was just kind.
quotation.source: The Twelfth Doctor, in "Twice Upon A Time"

quotation.p: You were right, you know? The universe generally fails to be a fairy tale. But that's where we come in.
quotation.source: The Twelfth Doctor, in "Twice Upon A Time"

quotation.p: "You know what the hardest thing about knowing you was?"
"My superior intelligence? My dazzling charisma? Oh, my impeccable dress sense."
"Letting you go. Letting go of the Doctor is so, so hard, isn't it?"
quotation.source: Bill and the Twelfth Doctor, in "Twice Upon A Time"

quotation.p: You're just memories, held in glass. Do you know how many of you I could fill? I would shatter you. My testimony would shatter all of you.
quotation.source: The Twelfth Doctor, in "Twice Upon A Time"

quotation.p: A life this long -- do you understand what it is? It's a battlefield, like this one. <gestures> And it's empty. Because everyone else has fallen.
quotation.source: The Twelfth Doctor, in "Twice Upon A Time"

quotation.p: Time to leave the battlefield.
quotation.source: The Twelfth Doctor, in "Twice Upon A Time"

quotation.p: Well, I suppose... one more lifetime won't kill anyone. Well, except me.
quotation.source: The Twelfth Doctor, in "Twice Upon A Time"

quotation.p: I've got a few things to say to you. Basic stuff first. Never be cruel, never be cowardly. And never, ever eat pears.
quotation.source: The Twelfth Doctor, in "Twice Upon A Time"

quotation.p: Laugh hard. Run fast. Be kind.
quotation.source: The Twelfth Doctor, in "Twice Upon A Time"

quotation.p: Doctor, I let you go.
quotation.source: Last words of the Twelfth Doctor, in "Twice Upon A Time"

quotation.p: Oh, brilliant
quotation.source: First words of the Thirteenth Doctor, in "Twice Upon A Time"
